update device
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_card_id = #{identityCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

driving_Authority_name = #{drivingAuthorityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
